message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're interested.
